mainSequence.step: User initiates the application by running the command npm start
Knex library is required by the application
Connection to the database is established using node_postgres
Connection to the PostgreSQL database is successfully authenticated
Knex library acquires a connection and adds it to the connection pool
An instance of Knex is created
Bookshelf library is required and the passed Knex instance is used
Recipe data is fetched from the database using the Bookshelf library
Knex selects data from the 'recipe' table
A connection is acquired from the connection pool
Data is retrieved from the 'recipe' table in the database
Connection is released back to the connection pool
Fetched recipe data is passed back to the application through Bookshelf
User receives the list of recipes including flatbread and bread
